items.content_html: Pokémon Explorer is a lightweight, interactive web application that allows users to search, explore, and filter Pokémon using the PokéAPI. Users can search by name, ID, type, or generation, and view detailed information including stats, types, sprites, and more.
items.title: ImFla23/Pokedex-Explorer-app: Pokémon Explorer is a lightweight, interactive web application that allows users to search, explore, and filter Pokémon using the PokéAPI. Users can search by name, ID, type, or generation, and view detailed information including stats, types, sprites, and more.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library for creating dynamic, draggable UI elements and controls for web applications. Particularly useful for canvas-based applications or HMIs (Human Machine Interfaces).

items.content_html: A simple and lightweight Chrome Extension that uses the webcam to detect motion in real-time. It leverages pixel difference analysis to track movement and display a visual notification when motion is detected.

items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
